title: League requested permissions to access CMD prompt?
body:
I accidentally opened the legacy client to league of legends. The old client opened up and said something along the lines of "Leagues updated client is live" so I clicked on that, and it opened the normal league of legends client.  

During that though, it asked me for permission to access cmd prompt. I am an idiot, and accepted before really thinking about it. 

Is this a virus you think?

replies.body: No worries here! That can happen with the new installer when it needs to update your shortcuts.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bNaXmyvm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-13T02:55:30.054+0000)
>
> No worries here! That can happen with the new installer when it needs to update your shortcuts.

Awesome thanks.
I had the same thing pop up. Just to update the logo to the right one in case it was the old one like mine from what I understand.
